title: Fudgy chocolate banana brownies
ingredients: ['Banana brownies', '175g dark chocolate chips', '60g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 large ripe bananas, mashed', '2 eggs, well beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '60g chopped pecans', 'Icing', '50g butter', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '175g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons milk, or more as needed']
